ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Air
ygData.msgSnippet: I meant if you leave the plane. that is how they were supposed to work. Strange... *thinks* -Martyn ... From: Dark [mailto:jackal@voicenet.com] Sent: Saturday,
ygData.messageBody:
I meant if you leave the plane.
that is how they were supposed to work.
Strange...
*thinks*
-Martyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Dark [mailto:jackal@...]
Sent: Saturday, January 22, 2000 3:06 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Plane of Air


From: "Dark" <jackal@...>

Quests items don't dissapear. A warrior had some quest items and logged he
came back and still had the items.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Josh Moore <josh@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, January 22, 2000 2:57 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Plane of Air


>From: "Josh Moore" <josh@...>
>
>Beware of this. it may be a quest item that is needed for the real quests,
>and as such, *may* dissappear once you leave the plane
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: M Sanford [mailto:pr0teus@...]
>Sent: Saturday, January 22, 2000 7:53 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Plane of Air
>
>
>From: M Sanford <pr0teus@...>
>
>The same item dropped on Tarew Marr last night. Lemme confirm a few things
>with ya if you would. It drops
>on the third (gorgon) island off a harpie type thing. Or if not a harpie a
>Gorgalask since they look the
>same. FoH reported a Pal-only belt with the same sort of stats so I'm
>assuming they drop for all melee
>classes randomly on a specific mob perhaps.
>
>Shada, each class gets 6 quest items, and supposedly there's tons of other
>stuff that drops as normal
>loot. On Tarew Marr we obtained only 2 "dropped" items which includes the
>bard haste belt last night
>however, so we'll see.
>
>Maev Lorekeeper
>Tarew Marr
>
>Andy Simpson wrote:
>
>> Here are the numbers on the first bard armor I've seen from Plane of Air.
>>
>> Belt (don't remember name)
>>
>> 6 AC 6 CHA 5 STR HASTE +5 Sv Poison
>>
>> I'll have to check my screenshots to find out the mob that drops it.
>>
>> Anthem Dirgemaker
>> Level 50 Bard of Qeynos
>> Solusek Ro
>
>
